ygData.subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
ygData.msgSnippet: Necromancer hears the comm from FZ and fails to be impressed. I will acknowlege a cease fire when you and your kind are elsewhere. The bot spreads his wings

Necromancer hears the comm from FZ and fails to be impressed. "I will 
acknowlege a cease fire when you and your kind are elsewhere." The 
bot spreads his wings steadily holding his weapon aimed back and 
forth between the bots who'd just seperated.

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ looks over at the firing Maximal, sighing. He opens a comm link.
> 
> "Maximal warrior, your leader has ordered you to cease fire, as my 
> troops are doing as well. Please concurr with her orders."
> 
> He was really surprised at how badly these Maximals followed 
orders. 
> He knew that Liono's days were pretty bad, but the Maximals didn't 
> even look like warriors. They reminded him of little kids, 
squabbling 
> to get what they want no matter what their superiors ordered.
> 
> If the Alliance got like that, they would fall out of the ranks 
> instantly.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Necromancer looked on in satisfaction as Mobster seperated. He 
> fired 
> > three ice blasts at Horn drill, then switched the setting and 
fired 
> a 
> > fireball at Gigas.
